channel.title: A-gps. At-Commands
channel.description: Hello, I want to use A-gps, but as I understand, it receives data from the supl server via the Internet connection, so I need to turn on the Internet before I start receiving coordinates, I would like to know if there is any AT commands to understand if the ephemirides and almanacs are up-to date in the device.

item.title: A-gps. At-Commands
item.dc:creator: Elkanamol
item.description:
@gennadyk
you have the AT commands guide from Sierra source, I will focus on !GPSSUPLVER and !GPSSUPLURL.

https://source.sierrawireless.com/resources/airprime/software/airprime_wpx5xx_wp76xx_wp77xx_at_command_reference/#sthash.j0niYO5i.dpbs

ElkanaM

Read full topic

item.description:
Hello, I want to use A-gps, but as I understand, it receives data from the supl server via the Internet connection, so I need to turn on the Internet before I start receiving coordinates, I would like to know if there is any AT commands to understand if the ephemirides and almanacs are up-to date in the device.
